bot_config {"Prefix": "$"}
insert_channel {"id": 1, "user_id": 1, "name": "foobar", "prefix": "+", "bot_name": "hortbot"}

handle hortbot @id=8c985895-a6e0-44b3-8153-c760a3e3a762;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+prefix !
send hortbot #foobar [HB] prefix changed to !

handle hortbot @id=326d20f0-e0e3-4e2a-9bae-c94f6ef168d9;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+prefix reset
# No reply

handle hortbot @id=4ac3bc1a-26de-47b2-8ee9-1a68263429a5;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!prefix reset
send hortbot #foobar [HB] prefix reset to $

handle hortbot @id=6e9e4435-a465-46e2-b885-e40c868b9738;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :$prefix
send hortbot #foobar [HB] prefix is $
